resources.string: (born December 27, 1988) is an American singer, songwriter, and musician. She serves as the lead vocalist, primary songwriter and occasional keyboardist of the rock band Paramore.
(born June 4th 1990) was the first and current drummer for the rock band Paramore to which he is also one of the founding members of.
The rhythm guitarist for the alternative/pop-punk band Paramore and was born December 17, 1989 (age 28) in Nashville, Tennessee.
